body_html:
I checked on regular cifs and got the same error.
Linux alexu 4.15.0-22-generic #24-Ubuntu SMP Wed May 16 12:15:17 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

smb deamon is running on local host
$ smbd -V
Version 4.7.6-Ubuntu
$ mount.cifs -V
mount.cifs version: 6.8

mount command:
mount -t cifs //127.0.0.1/demo /home/alex/demo

Repro:
$ cd /home/alex/demo
$ touch source.txt
$ touch target.txt
$ python

Python 2.7.15rc1 (default, Apr 15 2018, 21:51:34) 
[GCC 7.3.0] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import os
>>> f = open('target.txt', 'r')
>>> os.rename('source.txt', 'target.txt')
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
OSError: [Errno 13] Permission denied
>>>

body:
I checked on regular cifs and got the same error.
Linux alexu 4.15.0-22-generic #24-Ubuntu SMP Wed May 16 12:15:17 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

smb deamon is running on local host 
$ smbd -V
Version 4.7.6-Ubuntu
$ mount.cifs -V
mount.cifs version: 6.8

mount command:
mount -t cifs //127.0.0.1/demo /home/alex/demo

Repro:
$ cd /home/alex/demo
$ touch source.txt
$ touch target.txt
$ python
```
Python 2.7.15rc1 (default, Apr 15 2018, 21:51:34) 
[GCC 7.3.0] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import os
>>> f = open('target.txt', 'r')
>>> os.rename('source.txt', 'target.txt')
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
OSError: [Errno 13] Permission denied
>>> 
```
